name: Origin Bancorp, Inc.
description: Origin Bancorp, Inc. is a financial holding company based in Ruston, Louisiana, that provides a full range of banking services to individuals and businesses. Founded in 1912, the company operates through its wholly-owned subsidiary, Origin Bank, which offers a variety of products including personal and business banking, mortgage lending, and wealth management solutions. With a strong commitment to community banking, Origin Bancorp emphasizes personalized service, local decision-making, and community involvement. The bank serves customers across Louisiana and Texas, providing innovative financial solutions tailored to meet the unique needs of each client. Origin Bancorp's strategic growth initiatives include expanding its branch network and enhancing digital banking capabilities to improve customers' banking experience. The company is dedicated to maintaining strong relationships with its customers, employees, and the communities it serves while adhering to high standards of corporate governance and risk management. As a publicly traded company, Origin Bancorp aims to deliver sustainable growth and value to its shareholders through prudent financial practices and a focus on customer service excellence.
